description:
Lord Captain! Void Shadows DLC is out now! 

Explore the darkest corners of the von Valancius flagship and prepare to face a new hidden threat and meet a new deadly ally, covered by the shadow of the Void.

title: DLC Release Trailer Void Shadows | Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader

description:
Welcome to the grimdark world of Warhammer 40,000, and congratulations on getting your hands on Space Marine 2: Recruit Edition! In this easy-to-follow guide, paint along with Ollie as he shows you everything you need to know about painting this great entry point into the hobby. 

Paints included - 

Base:
Abaddon Black
Balthasar Gold
Macragge Blue
Naggaroth Night
Wraith Bone

Shade:
Nuln Oil

Technicals:
Astrogranite

If you're new to painting, our Citadel Colour Painting Essentials playlist hosts an array of beginner-friendly videos to help you get started.

Interested in Space Marine 2: Recruit Edition? This article explains what it is and where to get it: ow.ly/c1rz50Tupqr

title: How to Paint: Space Marine 2: Recruit Edition | Beginner | Warhammer 40,000

description:
Ever wanted to work on your blue steel? Well, in today's video, Dan will be looking at a quick way to paint blue steel normally seen on Grey Knights! And with an extra paint, he’ll be showing you how to paint a metallic version of their power swords! 

And here we have a list of the paints we've used today!

Contrast:
Kroxigor Scales
Stormfiend
Talasar Blue

Base:
Grey Knight Steel

Layer:
Stormhost Silver
